title: Did Pierre Trudeau say about Richard Nixon: "I have been called worse by better people? '
subtitle: When President Donald Trump defeated Canadian leader Justin Trudeau, he quoted ratios to Trudeau's father after he had been insulted by another President of the United States who had spread social media.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: When Prime Minister Pierre Trudeau of Canada learned that Richard Nixon had insulted him, he answered, "I have been called worse things by better people."
